channel.title: 704 Exp rates, and moving npc's
channel.description:
How do I set exp rates on every skill and how do I move shops on a 704
I use to run a 508 but it was... not updated enough, could anyone help?
Ps. I will reply as soon as I get home from class, thanks for any / all the replys
